# deep phaser
deep phaser is a FIR phaser plugin.  
it is the son of steep-flanger and dispersive-delay.  
it can generate effects sounds like harmor phaser.  
![FX](effects.png)

> [!WARNNING]  
> massive cpu consume for calculating allpass filters.  

## signal-flow

## features
FIR phaser  
barberpole phasing
